short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Extension to show IMDb ratings on Netflix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate Netflix companion - a browser extension that displays IMDb ratings on Netflix pages and allows filtering! This nifty tool takes your binge-watch game up a notch by providing you with ratings from the world's most trusted online movie database, IMDb. And the best part? You can filter your search based on ratings, genres, and more, ensuring you only see the content you're interested in. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and hello to your personalized Netflix experience!

1.0.2
- Movies without ratings are now marked with "?"
- Fixed minor issues with fetching ratings
- Ratings filter no longer shown in Netflix when watching
